get.summary: Retrieve an Item's label in a specific language, with language fallback
get.description: If a label is defined in the requested language, the API responds with a 200 status code and includes the label in the response payload. If a label only exists in a fallback language, the API returns a 307 status code and provides the location of the label.

200.description: Item's label in a specific language. If a label only exists in a fallback language, the API returns a 307 status code and provides its location.
